channel.title: Need help with monster drops. Take a look. [317 sever]
channel.description:
1.how can i change what monsters drop 2.also how can i change it so it takes for ever to get rare item from monster 3.how can i change what comes out of my stalls when i steal from it so it money but i want to add more money
ty for your help

item.title: Need help with monster drops. Take a look. [317 sever]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

for the stall part you must find the the object id of the stall that you want to change. serch in client.java the object id. you will see the amount of money you get for each thiev then simpley just change the amount realy easy

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with monster drops. Take a look. [317 sever]

item.title: Need help with monster drops. Take a look. [317 sever]
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler bifocaler
item.description:
@bifocaler wrote:

[quote=“gether, post:2, topic:344249”]npcdrop = 72 7611 1 1
npcdrop = 72 2621 1 1
npcdrop = 72 2440 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2436 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2442 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2436 1 50
npcdrop = 72 536 1 100
thats for mith drag so its npcdrop == (npcid)[tab](item #)[tab](ammount of item)[tab](percentage of chance of drop)

for it click on it let says u get 900gp ud go into your client.java and search

addItem(995, 900);

once u find it right by an object id for it change the 900 to the ammount u want for the stall.[/quote]ty but i dont get stall part

Read full topic

npcdrop = 72 7611 1 1
npcdrop = 72 2621 1 1
npcdrop = 72 2440 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2436 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2442 1 50
npcdrop = 72 2436 1 50
npcdrop = 72 536 1 100
thats for mith drag so its npcdrop == (npcid)[tab](item #)[tab](ammount of item)[tab](percentage of chance of drop)

for it click on it let says u get 900gp ud go into your client.java and search

addItem(995, 900);

once u find it right by an object id for it change the 900 to the ammount u want for the stall.
